subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[harm]]; to [[maim]]; to [[injure]]
# to [[cause]] to do; to [[result]] in (something unfavourable)
#* {{zh-x|航班 晚點 了，害 我 多 等 了 兩 個 小時。|The flight was delayed, causing me to wait for another two hours.}}
# to [[kill]]; to [[murder]]
# to [[suffer]] from
# to [[feel]] (an adverse sentiment)
# [[harm]]; [[disaster]]; [[calamity]]
# [[crucial]] [[point]]; [[vital]] point
# [[harmful]]; [[injurious]]
# {{lb|zh|Min Nan}} [[broken]]
